github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate funny and creative commit messages that make playful references to pop culture. Ensure that each line is no longer than 100 characters. Think of lines like 'Is this the real life or is this just fantasy?' but don't limit yourself to musicâ€”include movie quotes, literature lines, or any recognizable cultural reference to add a humorous twist to your commits.
Make sure to include a list of files changed in the commit at the end of the message, formatted as 'Files: [file1, file2, ...]'. This will help keep track of what was modified in a fun way.
